text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the official Iraqi press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- International community demands immediate withdrawal of Turkish troops from northern Iraq.
- Russia says sanctions on Iraq should be lifted.
- Ship loaded with wheat arrives at Umm Qasr port in southern Iraq.
- Iraqi workers stage demonstration against Turkish incursion.
- Yemeni president calls for a unified Arab stand against Turkish invasion.
- Pakistan's interior minister receives Iraqi ambassador.
(The above were also carried by JUMHOURIYA and AL-IRAQ)
- Importance of low prices in current economic situation.
- More public services executed in Basra.
- China to supply Iraq with advanced technology.
- Socialists victory in France a threat to NATO.
- Preparations underway for harvest campaign in Nineveh province.
